_pdf Reordering Your Pages… Do You Want to Delete Selected File? Files Deleted Recently Used Features Question Answer
What is the supported image formats?#####R PDF Editor Offline app supported png, jpg, jpeg, tiff, gif, psd, bmp, eps etc.
Can I create a new text file using this app?#####No, You can not create text file using this app but you can create pdf file from text file.
Is there any limitation of images include in create PDF?#####No, there is not any limitation. You can include unlimited images and create pdf.
Can I insert captions in the image?#####No, captions not included in pdf file.
Can I read pdf file using this app?#####No, As of now you can only create pdf not view pdf file.
Where are the pdf file save in my device?#####You can check destination folder on setting section and yes you can change as per you want.
Can I share the pdf files that are created/edited using this app?#####Yes, you can share from view files section.
Can I recover forgot password of pdf document?#####No, You can not recover lost password of pdf document.
Can I change the password of pdf file?#####Yes but you need to first remove the password and again add new password.
Can I compress the images before creating pdf?#####Yes you can compress the images.
What is the format of the images extracted from pdf?#####Extracted image format is .png
Can I add files from cloud/online storage?#####No you can not add files from clould storage.
What is the format of the images extracted from a PDF?#####The images extracted from a PDF will be in .png format.
How can I check created file history?#####Just goto History section where you can see list of created or modified files.
How to merge multiple pdf files?#####Just goto merge pdf file section where you can select your multiple pdf file and just one click to merge it.
Can I edit images while creating pdf?#####Yes, you can edit images like apply filter and then after select images while creating pdf.
How can I add watermark to the pdf?#####You can add watermark from \"Add Watermark\" section.
Can I reorder the pages in pdf?#####Yes, You can reorder the pdf pages using "Reorder Pages" section.
How can I extract images from pdf?#####Just go to extract images section then after select pdf file and extract image.
Can I convert pdf into PPT, PPTX, ODT, DOC or DOCX format?#####No, As of now you can not convert that using this app.
Where can I download R PDF Editor Offline App?#####It\'s available on google app store so there you can easily download on your android device.
